sentences.en: ‘Why don’t you just leave?’ ‘I’d like to,’ she answered, ‘but I have nowhere else to go.’
sentences.cn: “你为什么不一走了之？”“我倒是想走，”她回答说，“但是我没有其他地方可去。”

sentences.en: "I can't give you an answer now," he hedged.
sentences.cn: “我现在不能回答你，”他闪避道。

sentences.en: an attractive woman answering to the name of Suzanne.
sentences.cn: 芳名苏珊娜的妩媚女人。

sentences.en: And so, to answer your question, that's why your mother is disappointed.
sentences.cn: 现在可以回答你的问题了，你母亲失望的原因就在这里。

sentences.en: Does this answer your requirements?
sentences.cn: 这个符合你的要求吗？

sentences.en: Every time I ask him about it, I get a different answer.
sentences.cn: 我每次问他此这件事，都得到不同的回答。

sentences.en: He grimaced slightly, obviously expecting no answer to his rhetorical question.
sentences.cn: 他微微皱了下眉头，显然并不期待任何人回答他的反问。

sentences.en: He must be made to answer for his terrible crimes.
sentences.cn: 他必须为他的严重罪行付出代价。

sentences.en: He still hadn’t answered my question .
sentences.cn: 他仍然没有回答我的问题。

sentences.en: He was never able to get a straight answer about why it happened.
sentences.cn: 事情为什么会发生，他一直没有得到直接的回答。

sentences.en: How much was it? Come on, answer me.
sentences.cn: 多少钱？ 快点告诉我吧。

sentences.en: I don't quite know what to say in answer to your question.
sentences.cn: 我不太清楚如何回答你的问题。

sentences.en: I hurried along the passage in answer to the doorbell's ring.
sentences.cn: 听到门铃响我匆匆穿过走道去开门。

sentences.en: I'll be happy to answer any questions if there are any.
sentences.cn: 如果有问题，我很乐意回答。

sentences.en: I'm afraid I have to answer a call of nature.
sentences.cn: 抱歉我要去趟洗手间。

sentences.en: If it’s money you want, the answer is no !
sentences.cn: 如果你要的是钱，回答是不行！

sentences.en: In answer to your question , yes, you can go.
sentences.cn: 我来回答你的问题，是的，你可以去。

sentences.en: It was a question that Roy not unnaturally found impossible to answer.
sentences.cn: 那是个罗伊显然无法回答的问题。

sentences.en: It’s impossible for me to give you a definite answer at this time.
sentences.cn: 现在我无法给你明确答复。

sentences.en: She had rung off before he could press her for an answer.
sentences.cn: 他还没来得及催她回答，她就挂断了电话。

sentences.en: She is tough, unwilling to take no for an answer.
sentences.cn: 她很强硬，不达目的誓不罢休。

sentences.en: She thought for a moment before answering.
sentences.cn: 她想了一会儿才回答。

sentences.en: She’s still waiting for an answer from the school.
sentences.cn: 她还在等校方的答复。

sentences.en: The answer had come to him in a flash.
sentences.cn: 他一下子就有了答案。

sentences.en: The honest answer was that I didn’t know.
sentences.cn: 坦白回答，我不知道。

sentences.en: The housekeeper moved smartly to the Vicar's desk to answer the call.
sentences.cn: 管家迅速来到牧师的书桌前接电话。

sentences.en: The short answer is that it can’t be done.
sentences.cn: 简单的回答就是做不了。

sentences.en: This drug could be the answer to our prayers.
sentences.cn: 这种药或许可以满足我们的祈望。

sentences.en: Two historical questions — you can answer them how you like.
sentences.cn: 两个历史问题——你可以随便回答。

sentences.en: Two men answer-ing the description of the suspects tried to enter Switzerland.
sentences.cn: 与描述的疑犯样子相符的两名男子试图进入瑞士。

sentences.en: What was the answer to question 4?
sentences.cn: 第四题的答案是什么？

sentences.en: You don’t have to give them an answer now.
sentences.cn: 你不必现在就给他们答复。

words.tran_cn: 应负责任的；可回答的；有责任的

phrases.tran_cn: 答案；题解；练习答案（解答）
留言机，电话录音机；电话留言；接电话
（尤指警察对嫌疑犯的描述）描述相符
见多识广；自命不凡；好象什么都知道的样子
温和的回答；轻轻的回答；委婉的回答

trans.tran_cn: 回答，回信，解决办法，答案，回应，不相上下的事物
trans.tran_en: something you say when you reply to a question that someone has asked you

trans.tran_cn: 回答，答复，作出回应，符合，相配
trans.tran_en: to say something to someone as a reply when they have asked you a question, made a suggestion etc
